backend/main.mo: Implements a simple per-device cooldown using a map of last action timestamps and exposes functions to check or record actions.
feature_evidence.json: Defines a feature evidence report describing a hero-section background image update and its related file and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for various frontend source files, covering layout, pages, sections, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining color tokens, dark mode variants, and global background/foreground rules.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading fonts, metadata, and mounting the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with routes for home, privacy, and terms pages wrapped in a shared layout.
frontend/src/components/common/ImageWith: Image component that shows a gradient placeholder during load or failure and resets state when the src changes.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer with company info, links, social icons, and a WhatsApp button gated by backend rate-limit checks.
frontend/src/components/layout/Navbar.ts: Responsive navbar with brand navigation and section scrolling supported by TanStack Router.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Layout wrapper rendering navbar, routed content outlet, and footer.
frontend/src/components/sections/AboutSe: About section describing MagadhPrime’s production quality and chemical-free processing.
frontend/src/components/sections/Benefit: Displays four benefit cards highlighting organic wheat, added bran, no chemicals, and hygiene-focused production.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Hero banner with background image, product messaging, and a WhatsApp order button with rate‑limit checking.
frontend/src/components/sections/Support: Support form collecting name, phone, and message with validation, rate‑limit checks, and Google Forms submission.
frontend/src/components/sections/VisualT: Displays a grid of production‑process images loaded via generated asset URLs.
frontend/src/components/sections/WhatsAp: CTA section prompting WhatsApp ordering with rate‑limit logic and error handling.
frontend/src/config/marketing.ts: Centralized marketing config defining WhatsApp link, contact info, social links, and Google Forms field IDs.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Internet Identity auth context handling login, identity persistence, and status tracking using Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/usePageMeta.ts: Hook that updates the page title and meta description on mount or change.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus custom OKLCH color variables and utility classes for the site’s theme.
frontend/src/lib/assetUrl.ts: Utilities to build correct static asset URLs using Vite's base path, including helpers for generated assets.
frontend/src/lib/deviceId.ts: Generates and stores a persistent UUID in localStorage for per‑device identification.
frontend/src/lib/googleFormsSubmit.ts: Submits contact data to a configured Google Form using no‑cors POST and returns success/failure.
frontend/src/lib/rateLimit.ts: Checks rate limits via a backend actor using a device‑scoped action identifier and fails closed on errors.
frontend/src/lib/scrollToSection.ts: Smoothly scrolls to a DOM element by ID while offsetting for a sticky header.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point mounting React with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page assembling all marketing sections and handling hash‑based smooth scrolling with page metadata.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPolicyPage.tsx: Renders the Privacy Policy static content and sets page metadata.
frontend/src/pages/TermsOfUsePage.tsx: Renders the Terms of Use static content and sets page metadata.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS configuration with custom colors, typography, container settings, and animations.
project_state.json: Project configuration describing site goals, architecture notes, known issues, and existing features.
